org.sql: SELECT issues.* FROM issues INNER JOIN issue_statuses ON issue_statuses.id = issues.status_id INNER JOIN trackers ON trackers.id = issues.tracker_id INNER JOIN projects ON projects.id = issues.project_id INNER JOIN enumerations ON enumerations.id = issues.priority_id AND enumerations.type IN ('IssuePriority') WHERE (SELECT 1 FROM attachments AS a WHERE a.container_type = 'Issue' AND a.container_id = issues.id) IS NOT NULL

rewrites.sql: SELECT issues.* FROM issues INNER JOIN issue_statuses ON issue_statuses.id = issues.status_id INNER JOIN trackers ON trackers.id = issues.tracker_id INNER JOIN projects ON projects.id = issues.project_id WHERE (SELECT 1 FROM attachments AS a WHERE a.container_type = 'Issue' AND a.container_id = issues.id) IS NOT NULL
